generic <typename TLanguageKindEnum> where TLanguageKindEnum : value classpublic ref class CodeBlockStartAnalysisContext abstract

Docs.summary:
Context for a code block start action. A code block start action can use a to register actions to be executed at any of:
completion of semantic analysis of a method body or an expression appearing outside a method body, or
completion of semantic analysis of a syntax node.
